nodes.text: The Ducal Palace was located on Mid Rim terrestrial astronomical object Bamayar. During the Rebel Alliance's Mid Rim offensive, which began around 1 ABY, the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry occupied the palace. Hazram Namir, a First Sergeant in the 61st, remembered the capture of the Ducal Palace while on the planet Haidoral Prime in 3 ABY.
The Ducal Palace was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
